Text:
Whoa! Pre-80's Chaykin! Sweeeet!
It's like opening the tomb of Chaykin-Ho-Tep!
(Beware the Chaykin's curse. Thump, drag, thump!)

The thanks of a thousand years to LTS, who will live forever...
and prosper!

Pages 2, 15, 16, 24, 25 are missing. I can believe page 2 might be blank, hence its omission, but the other four pages are needed. LTS, could you please repair your torrent and upload a complete 'Empire' comic.

Thanx.
